fr.insa.rennes.info.chemical.backend
Class RandomIncrementStrategy

java.lang.Object
  fr.insa.rennes.info.chemical.backend.RandomIncrementStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IncrementStrategy
 class RandomIncrementStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IncrementStrategy

This class implements an random strategy iteration on reactives: the elements are randomly selected in order to simulate the non-determinism of a chemical reaction.

Author:
Andréolli Cédric, Boulanger Chloé, Cléro Olivier, Guellier Antoine, Guilloux Sébastien, Templé Arthur

Field Summary

          The current index (corresponding to an "ordered" index)

          The maximum value of the index
private  java.util.List<java.math.BigInteger> _shuffleList
          The list that transforms the "normal" (ordered) index in a random index.

RandomIncrementStrategy(java.math.BigInteger maxI)
          Sole constructor, with the maxIndex array that is needed to know how many columns there is for this index provider.

Field Detail

_currentIndex

private java.math.BigInteger _currentIndex
The current index (corresponding to an "ordered" index)

_maxIndex

private java.math.BigInteger _maxIndex
The maximum value of the index

_shuffleList

private java.util.List<java.math.BigInteger> _shuffleList
The list that transforms the "normal" (ordered) index in a random index. It will be used with _currentIndex to translate it to a "random" index: randomIndex = _shuffleList.get(_currentIndex)

Constructor Detail

RandomIncrementStrategy

public RandomIncrementStrategy(java.math.BigInteger maxI)
Sole constructor, with the maxIndex array that is needed to know how many columns there is for this index provider.

Parameters:
maxI - The maximum index array
Method Detail

increment

public void increment(SubIndexProviderSolution sipSol)
               throws ChemicalException
Increments the specified sub index provider of one step. Does not check the validity of the index provider, this is done in IndexProvider.increment(). This function basically process to the same operation as OrderedIncrementStrategy.increment(SubIndexProviderSolution), but it "translates" the ordered value to the "random" value with the list _shuffleList.

Specified by:
increment in interface IncrementStrategy
Parameters:
sipSol - The sub index provider on solution that has to be incremented.
Throws:
ChemicalException
